title: zach pls
itunes:title: zach pls
description:
It's a news-y kind of week as we ponder a single-player Apex Legends game, 2022 video game release dates, Peter Weller's totally-still-serviceable Robocop, and E3's future under ReedPop. Also, games such as Matchpoint: Tennis Championships, Cuphead, Horizon, Last Call BBS, and Vampire Survivors, plus two whole emails, one of which features the son of Mel Blanc!

Advertise on The Nextlander Podcast at Gumball.fm, or support us on Patreon!

CHAPTERS

(00:00:00) NOTE: Some timecodes may be inaccurate in versions other than the ad-free Patreon version due to dynamic ad insertions. Please use caution if skipping around to avoid spoilers. Thanks for listening.
(00:00:10) Intro
(00:00:54) 632 Years of combined industry experience
(00:02:39) Old video game reviews power the internet
(00:11:15) Is this the Age of Booty?
(00:12:41) Show rundown
(00:12:56) The News
(00:13:07) E3 is dead. Long live E3.
(00:35:38) First Break
(00:35:42) New Single-player Apex coming?
(00:42:31) Bayonetta 3 gets an October release date
(00:46:01) Skull and Bones is going to come out... in November
(00:49:18) The Sega Genesis Mini 2 is coming out in North America?
(00:52:18) Immortality has been delayed to August
(00:53:06) Robocop: Rogue City gets gameplay trailer
(00:58:34) Survival game based in the Terminator universe
(01:01:24) No more major Red Dead Online updates?
(01:03:55) Red Dead Redemption 2 for next gen has been shelved?
(01:08:56) Kojima threatens legal action after being falsely linked to assassination
(01:12:49) Second Break
(01:12:54) The Games
(01:13:05) Elden Ring
(01:14:13) Horizon Forbidden West [PlayStation 5, PlayStation 4] on Feb 18, 2022
(01:19:25) Matchpoint: Tennis Championships [PC (Microsoft Windows), Nintendo Switch, Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5] on Jul 07, 2022
(01:25:20) Cuphead: The Delicious Last Course [PC (Microsoft Windows), Xbox One, Nintendo Switch, PlayStation 4, Mac] on Jun 30, 2022
(01:32:14) Last Call BBS [PC (Microsoft Windows)] on Jul 05, 2022
(01:36:40) Vampire Survivors [PC (Microsoft Windows)] on Dec 17, 2021
(01:39:48) The Emails
(01:55:08) Wrapping up and thanks
(01:56:02) Mysterious Benefactor Shoutouts
(01:57:27) Coming up on Nextlander
(01:59:12) See ya!

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
